Flight attendants

Unparalleled Guidance and Mentorship

OpulentAirCrew is incomparable when it comes to the aviation industry, what sets us apart is our focus on matching our exceptional crew with the perfect aviation operator.

We provide you with specific guidance and insight into each operator and their personal needs, including tailored personal mentorship to equip you for each placement. With us we walk your aviation journey together, during every step whether it be permanent or freelance placement we will support you.

Mentorship programme

The OpulentAirCrew mentorship programme is a 5 module course that, upon completeion, you will be contacted by our recruitment specialist and become part of our database to be considered for the latest job opportunities.

Join our mentorship programme
